config.color.name: Color
config.color island.name: Color Island
config.color island.description:
Color of the water animation, but on Ginger Island
Island has a turquoise tint
config.Map Tiles Transparency.name: Map Tiles Transparency
config.Map Tiles Transparency.descriptio:
How clear the water depth is:
Mixed: Beach is Semi-Opaque, rest is Translucent
Translucent: Water is clear and all underwater is it's color
Semi-Opaque: Can't see underwater, also darker on deep parts
Opaque: The water depth is uniform
Disabled: Basically disables the mod but keeps all the other features you may want

config.Fill bridge holes.description: Wood bridges has some blue pixels holes, this option fills it with an unsaturated brown

config.Fish pond.description: Disable if you have a fish pond mod
config.Caves mode.name: Caves mode
config.Caves mode.description:
Default: Uses Map Tiles Transparency
Dirt: Transparent water with brown dirt
Seasonal (experimental): Color will match seasonal outdoors' water, but also affect the island
Disable if the water looks bad with a cave mod
config.Waterfalls mode.name: Waterfalls mode
config.Waterfalls mode.description:
Uses the option Color
Replace (Recommended):
 Replaces the sprites, looks the best with no map recolors
Overlay (old):
 Overlays the sprites
 Waterfalls will be brighter and less transparent
 May look different with a map recolor mod enabled
config.Beach Farm sand.name: Beach Farm sand
config.Beach Farm sand.description:
Uses the option Map Tiles Transparency
Changes the closest underwater sand on Beach Farm
Disable if it looks bad with a foliage mod
* If there is still an animation error, it's not my mod's fault
